name: Neon Asteroids (mik)
description:
Neon Asteroids.

it's Asteroids clone. Do I have to say more? You know what to do. Just added some sounds effects and colours.

But if you don't know what are these "Asteroids", all you have to do is to shoot asteroids, and try to score the highest.

CONTROLS

W - move forward

AD - Rotate

SPACE - Shoot
